name: Deeper In Space
description:
A silly platformer about a spaceman.

I'm very tired now I don't have much ideas for then page.

The game has infinite generated worlds (those are kinda crap but it works for now)

It is not much but I'm proud. Hope u like it!=)

How to play
  • WASD to move
  • R to restart
  • Space to jump
  • Esc to menu(It is kinda broken)
developers: A S F A L T.
